content: As per discussion at this week's call, I've closed https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues/147 and instead opened https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues/320 in its place. (@Jose Costa Teixeira I think this also supersedes https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues/82.) Feedback welcome and hopefully we'll have time to discuss next Tuesday.
